harmonictools.add_artificial¶

abjad.tools.harmonictools.add_artificial(note, diatonicInterval='perfect fourth')¶
>>> t = Note(0, (1, 4))
>>> harmonictools.add_artificial(t, 'perfect fourth')
>>> f(t)
<
        c'
        \tweak #'style #'harmonic
        f'
>4
